channel.title: Random value between X and Y
channel.description:
Hi all :)
It has been about 1,5 years since I've typed my last } (on a Runescape server that is.) And because of this, I became a little rusty on the even the most basic actions.
What I'm trying to do, is have my script generate a random value between 2 values (lets say a value between 5 and 10). I know about [b]misc.random[/b] but would this also work for generating a value between 2 values? And if not, then how should i do this?
Regards, SirPali

item.title: Random value between X and Y
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
